message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DL, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a novel approach to measuring the similarity of papers based on distributed representations learned from the citation context of papers. This approach is inspired by distributed representations of words in the literature of natural language processing. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Deep Learning (cs.DL), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
